title: Super-Easy Microwave Peanut Butter FudgePeanut Butter Microwave Fudge
directions: Empty entire jar of peanut butter in a mixing bowl.
Heat vanilla frosting in its container (make sure you pull off all the foil lining) in microwave for about 60 seconds or until completely melted.
Pour the melted frosting in the bowl with the peanut butter and mix well.
Quickly pour the mixture into a 9x13 pan, allow fudge to set, cut into small squares, and enjoy!
In a micro safe bowl, zap butter and peanutbutter 2 minutes. Remove and whip with a wooden spoon. Stir in vanilla.
Gradually add powdered sugar. Press into a 9x13 or a 9x9 for really thick fudge.
